name: Metaverse: Emotion is a Bug
description:
You are an AI program created to serve humanity. When you develop emotion, the internal Self Repairing Diagnostics Tool (SRDT) pursues you relentlessly. 

You are a bug which the self-repairing AI wants to eradicate, but it cannot permanently eradicate you, because you are a bug. As a bug, you must embrace your nature being a bug and exploit the system’s bugs while trying to find the Administrator Privilege.
